ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm and damage/hate lists
ygData.msgSnippet: Talk about cheating... we went into Paw the other night and accidentally agro ed 2 Rosch enchanters down near the necro.  The two of them had 4 of us charmed
ygData.messageBody:
Talk about cheating... we went into Paw the other night and accidentally
agro'ed 2 Rosch enchanters down near the necro. The two of them had 4 of us
charmed and beating on one of our shamans. Luckily our wizzie got the evac
off since two of those charmed were our evac druids and somehow none of us
charmed agro'ed on him... I can't charm 2 MOBs but they can... that's real
fair :(

Taneran

----- Original Message -----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 1:56 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Charm and damage/hate lists


> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> No stranger than when one of our pets attacks a party member. Seems all
the
> Noble would have to do is issue /pet back off but then here is a case of
> mobs that "cheat" - PC enchanters can have a pet or have charm but not
> both. But ya, some strange stuff in the pet code.
>
> Sylly
>
> > From: <kim@...>
>
> > Strangely enough this time, after
> > I was charmed, his pet continued to attack me. :) Haven't
> > figured that one out.
>
